title: Forced to Comply
description: Late on a Friday evening, Lauren is pulled over by a handsome cop and submitted to an intensely sexual body search.'Forced to Comply' is a short erotic story of about approximately 5,200 words.It includes XXX adult situations such as reluctant seduction, handcuffs, bondage, sex with strangers, sex in public, rough sex, fucking and domination.
author: Natasha Stories
